author: {'steamid': '76561198151435602', 'num_games_owned': 616, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1514987345}
review:
И так! Дальнобойщики 3! Пусть это уже старьё (2010 год), но мне было интересно.
Это очень хороший сиквел одной из величайших игр симуляторов дальнобойщика. Если вы играли в первую часть и фанатели от неё... Если потом дорога из Шахт в Алмазный была первым вашим маршрутом, а срезы Залесск-Приозёрск и Боровое-Горный были источником лицензий... Тогда вы обязаны посмотреть и эту часть. Пусть и с опозданием, но обязаны.
У неё есть несколько серьёзных минусов.
Во-первых, ждали её как и сталкера. Ооооооооочччееееееееееень долго. И получилось ну совсем не то, что ждали - например, первые две части - это что-то родное, а тут Америка.
Во-вторых, графика на момент выхода была на уровне (ну или чуть лучше) вышедшего на пару лет раньше ETS, но при этом в 2010 году вы должны были иметь достаточно мощный ПК для игры (в отличие от ETS).
В-третьих, в стиме вы получаете забугорную версию без возможности легальной русификации. И мне не сразу стало понятно, как купить официальный адд-он.
Но и плюсы тоже есть.
Если вы только-только раздымаваете о покупке (на распродаже-то всего 32 рубля!), то вероятно у вас достаточно производительный ПК. Вы сможете позволить себе приличные настройки графики и максимальное количество трафика. Это делает игру интереснее. Хотя появятся бесячие пробки, например.
По сравнению с предыдущей частью, трафик стал более разнообразный и, например, встречные грузовики теперь могут быть с прицепами. Этого честно не хватало во второй части. Да, детализация неуправляемых автомобилей, к сожалению, не блещет, но игра не сильно страдает от этого.
Появилась гораздо боле проработанная сюжетная часть. Во второй чатси сюжет ограничивался вступительным роликом, а в третьей у присутствуют полноценные сюжетные миссии и побочные задания. Но основа основ - перевозка грузов, - по-прежнему в центре внимания.

В итоге вы получаете более близкую по духу, душевную, родную (хоть и на просторах Америки) игру, чем всякие там E/ATS`ы. Может по многим параметрам она и не сможет с ними конкурировать, но ей явно есть, чем привлечь внимание.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096386289', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1566, 'last_played': 1601806453}
review: Не плохой симулятор но плохо что нету русского языка в игре

author: {'steamid': '76561198199639406', 'num_games_owned': 1469, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1512488005}
review:
Чтобы играть комфортно в эту игру - не поможет ничего. 
Русского языка в русской игре нет. Скачивание пиратки на лицензионную версию - высший формы идиотизм, которым я занялся и с которым игра вообще перестала работать. Далее, о самой игре - адекватного сглаживания в игре нет, гребенка такая будто ножи вонзают в глаза. Карта не удобная (поиграете - поймете). Попутчики не играют никакой роли, обычные нпс, которых всунуть в игру дело 5 секунд - это так для тех, кто хвалит ее за ТАКИЕ, МАТЬ ЕГО, БОЛЬШИЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ. Также не работает ручное переключение передач на клавиатуре, на геймпаде не работает адекватно даже поворот руля. Проблема с трафиком и поведением других авто на дороге. Но больше всего меня восхитила оптимизация. Игра выдает 40 фпс в городе на gtx1060 6гб. Скажите есть патчи и фиксы? Скажите, есть руководства, как поднять фпс? А мне то зачем это надо? Игра должна работать по нажатию всего 1 кнопки и мне должно быть весело. Я не должен купить игру и делать к ней потом патчи, руссификацию и оптимизацию на игру 7-летней давности. 
Во всех этих минусах, я нашел плюс - я купил ее за 30 рублей на распродаже. И наверное, она даже отбила эти деньги.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990395268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2180, 'last_played': 1510389677}
review: К черту всех рецензентов, которые пишут "Играйте лучше в American Truck Simulator". Это игра не про скучную доставку груза из пункта А в пункт В, это гонку и открытый мир! Да, она корявая жадностью 1С, но всё-таки офигенная. Если и сравнивать, то с GTA: San Andreas, там тоже были миссии дальнобойщика.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093518210', 'num_games_owned': 4565, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1572210196}
review:
Rig'n'roll para los que querían carreras con trailers! bueno, sigan quedándose con las ganas! :P

Somos un camionero que desea obtener el monopolio de transporte de mercancías del mundo, que en este caso se reduce a una parte de EEUU. Una tarea nada fácil, necesitaremos mucho dinero y es difícil lograr ingresos sostenidos. 

Arrancamos con un camión y nos iremos moviendo por todo el territorio en búsqueda de cargas para hacer entregas, la mismas pueden ser convencionales o podemos participar de carreras con cargas. Durante los viajes iremos interactuando con otros personajes que nos ofreceran cargas o nos pedirán favores. Lo lindo de este juego es que cuando vamos a un comedor, cargamos combustible, etc, se nos muestra como el conductor se baja del camión y realiza la actividad. El interactuar con otras personas nos introducirá dentro de historias y misiones secundarias que no me esperaba en un juego de este estilo.

En el apartado de manager debemos administrar camiones, conductores, almacenes, franquicias, etc. A los camiones los podemos mejorar y hacerle un poco de tunning. Este apartado es el que a pesar de las horas de juego que llevo todavía no he podido explorar en su totalidad, principalmente porque se necesita dinero y las oficinas donde debemos ir para administrar los negocios están difícil de encontrar. En general el juego es así, desde el menu principal no podemos hacer nada, más que grabar la partida. Las oficinas, talleres, etc que debemos visitar tenemos que descubrirlas en el mapa para acceder a todas las opciones de cada apartado.

La jugabilidad, es complicada al principio, si estás acostumbrado a los juegos con rutas marcadas en un GPS, aquí se te va a complicar y mucho. Debes guiarte mirando los carteles de la ruta y muchos de ellos tienen información confusa. El control del camión esta bien pero se hace imposible con las curvas, o utilizar retrovisores. Gran parte de las teclas asignadas para jugar no sirven para nada.

La IAs, el tráfico, es cierto, tienen un comportamiento espantoso, pero precisamente ESO es lo que hace divertido a este juego, me he echado unas risas con las actitudes de la IA, como verlas estrellarse contra bloques de hormigón en las calles que estan cerradas.
Una cosa irritable es que no se pueden pasar/cancelar las cinemáticas, al menos no encontre la forma. La anímación de los almacenes es tediosa.
Debo mencionar que el juego carece de un objetivo en concreto, lo que significa que no tiene rejugabilidad, lo juegas y en el futuro no volverás a tocar el juego. Por el momento supongo que las horas de diversión las tendrás intentando poder comprar todos los almacenes del mapa.
Acerca del mundo abierto, lo bueno de este juego es que si no tienes nada que te detenga como un muro, edificios, barreras, árboles, etc, puedes ir a donde quieras! lo que te permite introducirte en pueblos y caminos que no figuran en el mapa, dandote la posibilidad de investigar un poco. Esta posibilidad sin dudas más de uno la usara para cortar camino en muchas ocasiones :)

La música es buena, aunque solo son un par de tracks, sirve para acompañarte en la ruta, pero vas a tener que bajarle el volumen para poder esuchar lo diálogos. El sonido es malo.

Los gráficos, son los típicos de este estilo de juego, quizás lo lindo son los eventos climáticos y el cambio de los momentos del día. En cuanto a cámaras es limitado, pero la cámara que se ubica detrás del asiento del conductor es buenísima y no recuerdo haberla visto en otro juego. 

En conclusión, el juego a pesar de ser un poco incómodo con la jugabilidad, me gusto, lo compre con las rebajas de Steam por menos de 1 dólar, y no lo pagaría más que eso porque es antiguo y ya no va ser actualizado. Con todo lo dicho dejo a tu criterio si comprarlo o no, a mi me esta dando unas cuantas horas de diversión, así que he amortizado lo que pague! :)

Saludos!

review:
When this game was coming out, I was really excited. Then I hurry up and bought it without even looking at any reviews (never again) and was horrified. This game is somewhat fun but has this horrible "racing" system where you have to beat other (computer) trucks to the destination. This totally takes the simulation out of the game. I can see if it was multiplayer and you could try and beat your friends, I could go for that! 

If you want a good truck sim, try American Truck Simulator or any of the Euro Truck Simulator games from SCS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157256973', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 354, 'last_played': 1591934279}
review:
(This is actually an "old" game by now (from 2010) so I guess this is somewhat for historical purposes)

I really enjoyed this game when I first got it and have countless hours in it (I originally had this on Disc, not Steam, so I have much more time in it then my steam says)

[h1] Game Description [/h1]

In Rig'n'roll you drive Trucks in California, but this is no ordinary California, There is No Speed limit, you are only limited by your right foot, (and of course, what is under the hood) 
You pick up normal cargo from large warehouses and drop them off in large warehouses, you can get calls from people asking you to deliver special cargo, which you will pick up from empty lots or the side of the road and bring them to empty lots or the side of the road. You have to buy company offices in various cities to be able to take cargo from nearby cities/warehouses

[h1] To long, Didn't Read [/h1]
-Truck damage.
-Mandatory Story (although you can get around it)
-Police chases, not just insta-tickets.
-Donuts, Burnouts, The N20 Aggressor, It boosts your world. (it is a truck upgrade, press space if you have it, you go faster but use more fuel)
-physics can be questionable.
-Buy the game on sale.


[h1] Pros [/h1]
-this is like no other Truck driving Simulator, you can do donuts, burnouts, terrorize civilians. . .
-there is a Story line.
-truck upgrades.
-building your company.
-when you enter a Repair station, Fuel station Etc. a cutscene of you getting out of the truck plays, which In my oppinion helps with immersion (although some might get tired of it)
-visual damage, if you run into a pole your truck takes damage, with varying degrees of damage, from a cracked windshield and a door that won't close and the truck pulling to one side to blown tires, fuel tanks falling off, stripped gears and a hood that keeps trying to open.
-AI vehicles get damaged also, you can rear end a car and the rear window will break and the trunk will open.
-The N20 Aggressor, It boosts your world. (it is a truck upgrade, press space if you have it, you go faster but use more fuel, and it looks cool.)
-you can pick up hitch hikers and bring them where they need to go. (you can see them in the passenger seat)
-there are police chases, not insta-tickets, if you manage to outrun the police for long enough they will give up and you get away with what ever nefarious deed you did.


[h1] Common Problems People have with the game [/h1]
Alot of the complaints I have seen on the game are from User error so. . .
-"The field of view is strange" You can change the field of view, (default to / and *, check the key bindings)
-"no map" you can press Tab for the map, Ctrl Tab to change map zoom. F3 brings up a full-screen map. (along with other things)
-(In one youtube video, this guy drove onto the wrong side of the road, ran head-on into another truck and then 10 seconds later didn't know why the police were chasing him. . .) The police will give you tickets if you drive on the wrong side of the road, hit other vehicles Etc. they will be different cut scenes depending on what you are charged with. (standing on the side of the road while the officer writes out a ticket for minor things (driving on the wrong side) to handcuffing you while someone points a gun at you for things like running into other vehicles.

[h1] Cons [/h1]
-The physics can be questionable at times, but that is this case with all games.
-The story is mandatory so even if you just want to drive you might get calls for you to go pick up a passenger or something. (although you can avoid the story by right when you start the game, buy an office far north and drive around there and the story will not trigger, although you will be stuck away from where the game starts or the story will trigger)
-Practically no Mods.
-game was not supported for very long after release so bugs/glitches/whatever will not be fixed.
-Trailer physics can be questionable, because you pick up and drop off trailers at warehouse cutscenes the detaching and reattaching trailers outside of a warehouse is questionable.
-if you need to reattach a trailer you do not back Under the trailer, you would just run into and get a ticket for damaging it, you just back up to be infront of the trailer and it jumps onto the truck when you press T

[h1] Control, Control, you must press Control! [/h1]
pressing Ctrl in this game does alot, Ctrl tab changes the map zoom, Ctrl and the accelerator button will floor it instead of calmly driving off, Ctrl and one of the Turn buttons will swing the wheel all the way instead of just a little bit.

Currently at $4.99 USD that is not at all a bad price, but as always try and wait for a sale, it has gone on -75% sales in the past when it cost $9.99 I don't know if it will be 75% off at the current price of $4.99. 

Youtube videos on the game suck for some reason, 
-In one youtube video, this guy drove onto the wrong side of the road, ran head-on into another truck and then 10 seconds later didn't know why the police were chasing him. . .
-Another guy rear ended a car and didn't know why the police were chasing him.
so youtube will probably not be reliable source of help for this game.

review:
Эх, хорошая игра про дальнобой американский была! Несмотря на множество технических проблемм! В 2017 году когда есть ETS2 и ATS, Rig n Roll (Дальнобойщики 3) не смотрятся вообще никак!)) Но в свое время (для меня 2011год) поразила меня огромной картой США. Хорошим тюнингом грузовиков и интересной системой развития своей транспортной компании! В ETS2 не так интересно!
Главная фишкой игры это [b]ГОНКИ[/b] всегда и везде! Нужно доставить груз обогнав всех соперников при этом не убив грузовик и груз! Постоянно нужно [b]ГНАТЬ[/b]! Постоянный драйв! В ETS2 и ATS нехватает этой безбашенности!)))
Жаль версия английская! Русская продается в магазе Майкросовт за 500 рублей и DLC за 400 С УМА СОШЛИ!))) Это цена 2010 года!:0

author: {'steamid': '76561198078811539', 'num_games_owned': 1090, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1495575469}
review:
[h1]Rig n Roll[/h1]

The name itself I like, it seems well fitting. Although the game itself is rather a disaster for me.

The graphics, all in all, looked pretty decent on the steam web page screenshots and in-game.

Unfortunately, the game isn't what I hoped to be.

[h1]What's Wrong About It?[/h1]

[u]Quick Summary Checklist:[/u]
-Terrible Camera View
-Bad Optimization
-Bad FOV In-Cabin view
-Awkward unskippable cutscenes
-No Map what so ever, or any checkpoints to know where you're going.

[u]In Depth Details of my experience:[/u]

The Camera View isn't very good, the Camera ends up being so close to your truck In-View Cabin's windshield and outside of the truck, it's horrible to control with it.

Optimization I had problems with. I had an old laptop and had issues running it on Medium and High settings, and I was over the recommendations by far. Now, I have a new PC that I got with an RX 480 8GB, I thought it would get rid of the issue and fix it along with my decent CPU for this game. Wrong, the game, in fact, ran worst than it did on my laptop. Why? I have no clue.

The cutscenes man, I can't handle them. To me, it was awkward dialogue left and right along with the character movement. I just wanted to drive some trucks, not seeing these cutscenes left and right. 

There's no map to know what sense of direction to go. No checkpoints, GPS or anything.

[h1]Final Overview[/h1]

Look, if you want a decent truck game that's simulated I would rather stick with the SCS titles. I understand that this game is dated but the older titles of the [i]18 Wheels Of Steel[/i] Series was better than this with a whole lot more content. This game would only be good for such an 'arcade' feel I guess. I'm disappointed with my purchase on this, just glad I got it on sale, although unfortunately, I cannot refund it.

For my rating, unfortunately, tanks with this game.

I would have to give it a 3/10.

I would recommend checking out American Truck Simulator as I stated for a simulator.

review: Игра вроде бы российская, для Росии была локализована раньше всех, прекрасно озвучена российскими актерами, но версия в стим, почему то не получила не то чтобы, оригинальное название, русского даже игрой не поддерживается. Чтоже получается, на игру совсем положили болт издатели и разработчики. Короче, думаю ну черт с ним поиграю так, но английская озвучка настолько кошмарна, что уши вянут, в дальнейшем желание играть в это отпадает

author: {'steamid': '76561197996060913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1485725353}
review: Um estilo diferente até mesmo "exótico" de se jogar com caminhões..., longe de ser um simulador o jogo foca na diversão, tendo ele uma boa qualidade sonora, imagem muito boa para a epoca, e uma jogabilidade "sem compromisso" digamos assim..., pois não é nem boa nem ruim, vai sabê!!!...rs..., uma coisa que eu gostei muito nele são as posições de camera interna, com o jogador podendo se colocar na visão do passageiro do banco ao lado ou no sleeper traseiro, vendo inclusive as ações do motorista, como troca de marchas por exemplo.., conheço este jogo a algum tempo, joguei mais fora do steam, não fui muito longe na campanha, "me perdia com facilidade".. rs

author: {'steamid': '76561198011686046', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1478424243}
review:
2002: 1C Company published the game "King of the Road". That game has better graphics, runs better and especially nails the arcade aspect. Shorter Roads between citys, OffRoad-shortcuts, a Mafia... 

Rig n Roll is not a simulator. But the distances are. So you end up driving for hours on a straight road with arcade driving physics, shitty graphics, a Radio which has 3 Songs.. Don't buy this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085756586', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1654018862}
review:
If you want a simulation game, prepare to be disappointed in this. As an arcade game, this game kicks ass. Vanilla is OK, i recommend RnRMod 2.0 for the best gameplay. The fact that everything in this game is 1:1 scale and in real time makes this  game feel kinda, unique in a way. The customization is pretty good too, plenty of options to style your rig.  Driving is a bit wonky and the AI is glitchy but oh well, it's still a pretty good game. Oh and the awkward cutscenes. 
Worth 9.99e? I don't think so, get this game in a sale or a bundle

author: {'steamid': '76561198258207146', 'num_games_owned': 495, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1498570873}
review:
Eveeet!

Bu oyun hakkında yorum yapmak için aldım sadece.

Sizin yaptığınız, yapacağınız oyunun ben ta aq.

O.çocukları senelerce beklettiler bizi yok o olcak, yok bu olacak, yok ebenin nikahı.

Sizin yaptığınız, yapacağınız oyunun ben ta aq.

Oyun 3 haftada açılıyor, ayarları değiştirince oyunu kapatıyor. Oyun king of the road oyununun aynı haritasını kullanıyo, grafikler yarrak gibi. Sizin yapacağınız oyunun gelmişini geçmişini sikeyim ailecek.

18 TL değil, bedava verseler bu oyunu almayın arkadaşlar. Oyun da değil bu aq, sanal bebek. Bok gibi, iğrenç sıçmık bir program bu. Hiçbişey değil bu lanet şey.

Bizi senelerce bekletip, onları bunları yapacağız, oyunda herşey olacak diyen yapımcıların anasını avradını sikeyim. NET!

Forumlarda gece gündüz oyun yapımcılarıyla iç içeydik "hirşiy ilicik, bi ilicik, şi ilicik" sizin sıfatınızı sikeyim ben.

King of the road oyunun ismini değiştirip satsanız daha iyi aq un pezevenkleri, para tacirleri, yavşak suratlı enbesiller.

Steam kaldırsun şu boş şey,

"Hey Steam! Please delete this thing"

Oh be! Hadi kolay gele.

Hey Softlab, hey 1C Company, please translate this comment to your language, you will be happy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198047507356', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1470455716}
review:
Vice City Truck Simulator

This game is a fun story driven truck simulator game.  Heads up the handling of the trucks is very arcade like and not realistic like ETS2.  The game looks like the PS2 GTA games and your character looks like Tommy Vercetti lol.  The game actually uses real trucks like Freightliner, Peterbilt, Kenworth, Sterling and Western Star which is a huge plus towards making the game seem realistic, just like the Shell gas stations in the game. Its an overall good game and worth buying when its on sale and at full price is worth it too if u r a truck fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066316025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 5536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2285, 'last_played': 1683311353}
review: If you like driving sim games with a story line i highly recommend this to be the first game to try i just finished the story line today and its very twisted in the plot every twist and turn can effect how the game contiunes or stop the story line can you keep the mifia from killing you. truck are all real life rigs frieghtliner kenworth Peterbult Striling and more if you have what it take to bet the story line there is a very big reward in game cash for it and a title of best trucker Rig n Roll is a very great game to try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028673669', 'num_games_owned': 7009, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1344409200}
review:
I bet this would be one of the least useful reviews, well, I don't really care:

Hard Truck 2: King of the Road was my favorite game of this genre, it was all around 10/10 game, so when I saw this game on steam I was so exited because I expected the same game with better graphics and more content but what do we have:

-sh`tty graphics with lags
-sh`tty music
-sh`tty interface and unplayable controls
-rеtаrded collision physix
-I know this is not helpful for English review but this describes the quality of the game a lot - produced by Russian devs @ no Russian localization - yeh its THAT hard, ikr
-no steam achievements or steam cards
-no any reason to buy this game

Qualitywise this game is somewhere in between Lada racing club and any normal truck racing game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041952386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 3997, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1678608406}
review:
I like this game, it's pretty fun and doesn't take itself very seriously at all. It's just an evolution of 18 Wheeler and Big Mutha Truckers. My only complaint is the really wobbly physics...makes sense, top heavy and all that and I found it doesn't lend well for controller or keyboard (Way too many functions to map) so maybe a steering wheel is in order.

*Edit*

I have not changed my mind. The map is large, there's lots of cheesy cutscenes to watch and races while delivering to be done. A steering wheel, with pedals and a gear stick makes it much better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003019731', 'num_games_owned': 1876, 'num_reviews': 367, 'playtime_forever': 2134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2105, 'last_played': 1452384745}
review:
Nunca na minha vida imaginei que um jogo tosco de caminhoneiro iria me consumir 35 horas no Steam.

Foi um jogo que me rendeu momentos ímpares, de pegar um frete em uma ponta do mapa e ir fazer a entrega a uma hora de distância em outra ponta. Você tem uma hora para atravessar as rodovias e leva exatamente isso, talvez um pouco menos se acelerar bem, talvez um pouco mais se errar as placas. É uma hora de asfalto, sem uma tela de carregamento, com uma direção tranquila, onde dá para deixar o pensamento fluir e ouvir um Chitãozinho e Xororó para entrar no clima, tomando cuidado com os congestionamentos, a implacável polícia que não perdoa nenhuma infração e as curvas traiçoeiras.

Rig N' Roll é um jogo para relaxar no fim do dia e fingir que tem uma vida regada a gasolina, oficinas mecânicas e jaquetão de couro.

A princípio, pode parecer que o título é uma cópia descarada de EuroTruck Simulator, mas o jogo da SoftLab-NSK foi lançado quase ao mesmo tempo, em uma leva de simuladores de caminhão que varreu o cenário lá pelo fim dos anos 00.

A principal diferença de Rig N' Roll é que ele não se leva a sério. Não que seja um jogo de galhofa, com piadas absurdas ou humor negro. No sentido apenas que a simulação é mínima, os comandos são tão simples que um garoto de 8 anos pode literalmente completar um frete com danos mínimos ao veículo (eu vi acontecer). Existem vários comandos, mas você só precisa se concentrar mesmo no volante, aceleração e freio. O resto é cosmético. O resto está ali só para compor a fantasia de Carga Pesada, daquela vida suada mas livre dos lobos da estrada.

Rig N' Roll tenta colocar um modo história dentro da mecânica do jogo, mas o resultado é tão precário que dá a volta completa e fica bom. Você é o novo dono de uma empresa de transporte de cargas, seu amigo e um de seus funcionários desaparece, você investiga e esbarra em uma louca conspiração envolvendo o FBI, drogas futuristas, lendas urbanas e um míssil terra-terra disparado contra você. Tudo isso contado com animações que já deviam ser datadas na época do lançamento e uma dublagem meio forçada. Em alguns momentos, o enredo parece que vai engrenar, mas depois seus roteiristas perdem o fio da meada, introduzem personagens de supetão e entregam o final mais corrido e sem sentido possível. Dificlmente algum de vocês irá jogar isso até o final ou pela história, então eu posso dizer: na conclusão, você ultrapassa o chefe final em menos de 30 segundos de perseguição, o caminhão dele explode sem qualquer motivo aparente, você ganha o trofeu de Caminhoneiro do Ano e fim. Felizmente, o jogo permite que você continue jogando depois disso tudo, com meio milhão no cofre e essa infinita highway.

Contando assim parece que Rig N' Roll é um jogo ruim. E é mesmo. Seu maior inimigo é a péssima sinalização das estradas ou dos lugares onde você precisa fazer uma entrega. Você sentirá raiva de perder uma entrega porque entrou na agulha errada ou porque destruiu a frente do caminhão ao bater em um arbusto. Mas também é um título com um charme de cão vadio, que me levou a escrever um guia rodoviário, que me fez decorar algumas músicas sertanejas, que me fez ver que meu filho está pronto para jogos de corrida e que me apontou que, às vezes, sair da sua zona de conforto e deixar a sorte de apresentar um gênero novo pode ser uma viagem inesperada e inesquecível.

Originalmente publicado em: http://blog.retinadesgastada.com.br/2016/01/jogando-rig-n-roll-conclusao.html

review:
Это пожалуй единственная игра где действительно присутствует календарь, время года( со снегом дождем и листьями падающими с деревьев. Я сам несколько лет назад от нечего делать провел около 2 часов в игре чтобы спать сутки, и наконец дойти до зимы. 
Хочу сказать что зимой управляемость вообще никакая! Резину я менять не пробовал но снег шел) Так же я обнаружил что автомобили из трафика можно не только повреждаеются и дымятся, но и блять ещё нахуй взрываются, прикиньте!?!?  Русские красавчики! Немного ГТА в дальнобойщиках)

author: {'steamid': '76561198006159005', 'num_games_owned': 555, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1628965921}
review:
Наиграл на репаке порядочно часов, игра конечно порадовала. Но не порадовала оптимизация, сильно не порадовала. Мой агрегат в 2 раза помощнее, чем максимальные системные требования, но плавной картинки я так никогда и не видел. По самой игре: Карта большая и по виду вроде ничего. Тягач можно прокачать, куча разных интересных плюшек и даже рама цвета обсидиан)) Тормоза у тягача кончаются быстро. Раз 5-6 с 80 миль на юза - и тормозов нету))). Гонки так и остались ( виновата вторая часть, в которую я даже играть не стал ). Стоит ли в нее играть - конечно. Стоит ли она своих денег - думаю нет. Лучше по скидке брать. Меньше истратишь - меньше и разочерований)
                                                8 фредлайнеров центури в моей конторе из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198120735429', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1421807906}
review:
Являясь поклонником игры Дальнобойщики 2, по которой откатал десятки часов, эту игру я ждал начиная с конца 2004 года. Собирая всевозможную информацию из доступных мне на тот момент источников (коих было совсем не много, интернет еще был не так развит), я с предвкушением ожидал новых рейсов, новой графики, новых ощущений от игры, от геймплея. Ну ещё бы, ведь мы с Ником Перепеловым отправляемся покорять Запад. Отправляемся в страну возможностей!
Где каждый упорно трудящийся в конце концов получает свою American Dream! Вот и нам с главным героем предстоит достичь вершины карьеры грузоперевозчика, создать собственную транспортную компанию, таскать грузы по всему штату Калифорния (а в игре он воссоздан практически полностью и довольно достовено, на что разработчики потратили уйму сил, времени и ресурсов), завершать доставки своевременно, выигрывать гонки, обходить конкурентов, которые в свою очередь не брезгують ни чем, чтобы ни дать ни кому отвоевать у них долю рынка перевозок. При этом в игре кое как, но все таки присутствует сюжет, развитие которого, собственно ни как не влияет на происходящее в игре. Но слишком затянутые сроки разработки и некая корявость графики смазывают ощущения от игры. Отыграя в 2010 году более 20 часов, вдоволь покатавшись по хайвеям и получив свою порцию удовольствия от игры, я отложил ее в ящик и благополучно о ней забыл. Увидив Дальнобойщики 3 в Steam со скидкой -75% решил купить для коллекции. И поирав в нее чуть больше часа я ее удалил и не буду устанавливать снова. Игра была способна дарить приятные эмоции тогда, но после 270+ часов проведенных в игре Euro Track Simulator 2, играть в Rig 'n' Roll просто невозможно. Игра сама по себе хороша, но давно устарела морально и физически. Рекомендую к покупке только фанатам серии Дальгобойщики, и жанра в целом, и только со скидкой. Всем остальным обратить внимание на шедевральный Euro Track Simulator 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097290598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1394510683}
review: Очень обидно, купив лицензию, попутно скачивать репак с торрентов чтобы поиграть в эту и без того проблемную игру на русском языке. Я не верю что вторую и третью часть сделали одни и те же ребята. На смену простой, но атмосферной "Д2" пришла бездушная пластиковая "Д3", которая, будто издеваясь, может запороть сюжетный квест из-за чего прохождение дальше невозможно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128339309', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3666, 'last_played': 1582092449}
review:
Pros : Neat and big map, Nice trucks, Good driving experience with a steering wheel.


Cons : Terrible AI..By Terrible..I mean OVER THE TOP TERRIBLE, The Storyline SUCKS, Game mechanics SUCK...In certain deliveries you have to race different truckers..Isn't peaceful at all.


My rating : 5/10..Not bad, Not good.

Euro Truck Simulator 2 would be a better choice if you are looking for a truck simulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989310904', 'num_games_owned': 615, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1544046464}
review: o Jogo é bem legal. Infelizmente hoje em dia tem muito analfabeto que acha que analizar é o mesmo que comparar um jogo com outro, mas não é. Em se tratando de caminhões a maioria analiza qualquer joo comparando com euro truck simulator 2, e não há comparação pois são jogos diferente e engines diferentes. este jogo une, as perseguições policiais com a simulação de entregas com trucks, e diverte bastante. o unico ponto negativo na minha opinião são as cameras, que são dificeis de controlar além do zoom da camera da cabine nao permitir ver o retrovisor esquerdo enquanto dirige, mas no restante é um jogo muito legal de se jogar.

review: This game is awesome but some people dont know how to play it and start reporting it atleast it has american trucks other than euro truck simulator 2 ive played it perfectly fine and go check out the gold edition with sport trucks its awsome dont dislike it just learn how to play it its my favorite game when i started im like why did i waste my money but if u watch tutorials it helps so this game is worth it the creators put alot of details and effort to it and i get it that it glich sometimes that  has something to do with your computer not the game so i recommend this game but you can play euro truck simulator because of the graphics u can fix the graphics in this game on the settings so i recommend this game if u like american trucks and you need to have a computer such as windows NO MOBILE OR iMAC it only works for windows

author: {'steamid': '76561198064723791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1434559495}
review: Mediocre!....and with good reason. You have no idea where to go. When you get your trailer it just magically appears above and lowers down, no backing up and hitching it. The slightest bump brings the cops who have been equipped with matter transporters directly to your location. The in cab view is nuts making you think your nose is five inches from the windshield and when you try to map the commands to a controller you quickly learn you cannot map everything you need so it forces you to use keyboard as well. Biggest error of this is it will not let you use your mouse for steering such as in ETS 2 and that becomes a major killer of any sense of fun. This game is failure in every sense of the word. Avoid the pain and get something else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120610353', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1670092136}
review:
Bom, o que dizer a respeito do game.
 Em minha opnião, primeiramente quando o vi pela primeira vez, eu simplismente achei um jogo\ simulador \ arcade (seja lá como queiram rotula-lo) fantastico, na época tinhamos a disposição no mercado de games apenas a série 18WoS e talvez o Euro Truck Simulator (veja, não era o INCRIVEL Euro Truck Simulator 2 que temos hoje), que ao contrario do que a SCS Softwere disponibilizava na época, o Rig'n'Roll trazia recursos fantasticos para um Game \ Simulador de caminhoes na época, e trazia recursos que não vejo ainda hoje no Euro Truck Simulator 2.
 Pelo meu ponto de vista esse é sim um grande game, enbora nos tempos atuais ele tenha ficado muito batido, sem atualizações e sem nem mesmo poder receber mod algum, o que agravou ainda mais sua situação de descaso. 

 Pontos Positivos:
 - Animações no jogo
 - Possui uma Historia
 - Efeitos especiais
 - O caminhão se deforma com as batidas sofridas ( perdendo parachoque, quebrando os vidros, abrindo as portas e etc)
 - O veiculo explode quando sofrido muitos danos ou quando sofre uma batida frontal muito violenta.
 - Tem Missoes secundarias
 - O caminhao sofre desgaste natural de uso, tendo que ir a uma oficina para repara-lo como na vida real,
 - Tres modos de camera interna (dentro do veiculo)
 - Os caminhoes sao todos muito bem detalhados seguindo os reais.
 - Tem uma grande gama de acessorios, para equipar o veiculo.
 - Fisica diferente da encontrada no 18 WoS e ETS2.  
 - ETC

 Pontos Negativos:
 - O mapa é apenas na California.
 - A cidade de San Francisco não é funcional (voce apenas passa por ela, mas nao pega nenhuma carga)
 - Fisica ao mesmo tempo interessante e complicada de se lidar no começo.
 - Toda carga pega tem tempo para ser entregue, tirando um pouco do brilho do jogo.
 - Game não aceita Mods.
 - A produtora parece ter esquecido do game, pois não ah atualizações para o mesmo. (ao menos eu não vi)
 - Não tem a mesma liberdade do ETS 2.
 - Graficos já estao muito ultrapassados.
 - Não tem suporte ao idioma Portugues_BR
 - ETC.

É tudo que tenho para dizer a respeito do Rig'n'Roll, é um game interessante e legal, só não espere por algo exatamente ao ETS 2 , pois são games distintos ( claro) PORÉM se voce é um amante de games de caminhao e ainda mais da vida estradeira americana, vã em frente e compre-o, vai valer a pena, pelo menos pela interação com a historia e submissoes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064388679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 205, 'playtime_forever': 4773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4021, 'last_played': 1636360703}
review:
Awesome game!! It exceeded my expectations at all levels save one; the graphics performance is underwhelming. It's running at sub 60fps, not at minimum settings but even at minimum doesn't seem improve the frame rate. OK aside from performance issues, i have not encountered big bugs except in the initial stages after i had done a lot of tweakings. It randomly crashed twice while i was driving. Maybe it was due to too many changes and clicking the apply button. All is well now but with a slightly low performance as mentioned before.

So what's so good about this game? Well it's more than a truck cum business sim; it's also has a story.

Lets go over the features.

1) As a truck sim there are;

a) Headlights
b) Signal lights
c) Wipers
d) Parking brake
e) Engine brake
f) Truck equipment / component upgrades
g) repairs & maintenance costs
h) fuel requirement
i) hazard lights
j) horn
k) and of course, buying more trucks and upgrading your own truck (like in Hard Truck 2)

2) As a business sim there are;

a) Hire & fire drivers
b) buying more trucks
c) monitoring schedules
d) managing cash flow
e) expanding business reach by adding offices in other towns
f) competing with other companies (like in Hard Truck 2)

3) As a story;

a) a personal log of encounters along the way
b) cutscenes of your journey aka story
c) detailed animated characters
d) excellent voice acting

So what about the environment? Well it's good enough at low settings so it should be pretty impressive if maxed out. The road curves and hills are smooth, no jarring crude polygons as it once were in Hard Truck 2. No road mines either so that's a relief! Day and night cycles and weather cycles. The roads and highways, they are expansive and very impressive, at least to me. While driving from town to town there's plenty to see of the environment though some might disagree.

And driving physics? Seems very good, you can see the motion of the suspension on the individual wheels. Keyboard sensitivity can be adjusted from fast to slow. So does the centering rate. These 2 settings are very useful in finding the right balance to suit individual driving preference.

What about graphics and sound quality? All great! Trucks look detailed both in and out. Reflection details and rate of update can be adjusted many levels. Shadow details and viewing distance can also be adjusted many levels. Same with HDR and truck detail levels. In short all adjustable settings are graduated from 1 to 10 steps. Some settings only have on or off. It should be quite easy to find the right balance of quality and performance for any machine that meets the system requirements. Engine whirr and growl sounds real IMO. Radio stations play a wide selection of quality music. You can even add your own station like in Test Drive Unlimited.  Radio is one aspect where Rig 'n' Roll shine. You can hear up to 3 people talking in between music at random and they are rather funny & witty. What is even more amazing is the fact that the talking voices even interrupts your radio station.

Final aspect, nearly neglected to mention is the brilliant AI which ties the whole game together and is nothing short of amazing. Where in most other driving or racing games, the traffic or NPC AI is either dumb or gets in the way or pops in & out of existence at random just to block your path; in this game that rarely happens, even when you're racing with other AI truckers. AI traffic & other AI truckers not participating in the same cargo run, would never get in your way unless overtaking another AI traffic which is in-front of them. Even when your're driving against the flow, the AI traffic & other AI trucks cleverly avoid head-on collision. AI seems to extend even to the radio interruptions. For example; they might talk about the need to upgrade engine when your diving rather slowly in a race. The talking voices isn't there just to lend a live effect to the stations they also talk about random events that are happening in the game. Some messages given by the radio appears in your journal as clickable entries which may include random quests. Therefore turning on the radio becomes a necessity if you want to participate in the random events.

Cops are very aggressive and tenacious. It's almost impossible to lose them. If you go to a warehouse, they will follow you in or be waiting outside and continue the chase when you leave. If you refuse to stop, more cops will chase you and try to run you off the road. The resulting fines and damages to your rig can negate all rewards for the delivery or race run. So it's usually best to stop & pay-up at the first sign of a siren. Though it's possible to lose them, should they catch you later the previous fines are added to the current one. Also any accidents involving AI vehicles is deemed your fault no matter what; the cops are on a mission to give you a hard time. Never cross a yellow line in front of a cop or they will chase you to hell and back! Despite all the problems the cops can dish out, there's a neat feature called save game which can be made at any time while driving so you can immediately undo that horrible crash or wong turn you just made. ;)

Game world is huge, beautiful and detailed. The lighting and reflection effects on the road when it drizzles and vehicle surfaces are impressive. It's best to look around while driving to appreciate the game world but accurate and dexterous finger work is a must to avoid crashing into objects while not looking where you are going and controlling the camera views simultaneously. This game is a big improvement over Hard Truck 2 in all aspects. Glad i bought it despite the 'Mostly Negative' rating at the time of this writing. 

Lastly you don't need a wheel to drive well in this game; it works just fine with a keyboard. But you'll need a high-end rig to get the most out of it. Don't miss this underrated gem; try it for yourself. I absolutely love it! 4/5 stars.

http://games.dailymotion.com/video/x2j2s6g?utm_source=dailymotion&utm_medium=autopromo&utm_campaign=fromplayertogames

author: {'steamid': '76561198035696481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 5583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5114, 'last_played': 1631476378}
review: ok where to start. I will agree with most of the reviews on here. first and foremost THIS IS NOT A SIMULATOR. this is a arcade truck driving game. In my opinion this game has decent graphics for American trucks, and at present (to my knowledge) is the newest american truck driving game out until American Truck SImulator. but as stated earlier two entirely seperate games. Some Pros: Freightliner endorsed, variety of cargo, scenery is decent to look at (looks just like the california intersate) Traffic controls (for those that like light or no traffic) and there is a story line.  CONS: bad physics, low grade interior graphics, cops are too touchy, and the game is incomplete (as in-game the radio talks about and advertise a Las-Vegas add on yet it never was made). Closing Remarks: Play the game with an open mind and i think you will like it. as some have mentioned about no waypoints in the beginning of the game, just drive for a bit and something will happen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028575366', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1420749540}
review:
'It's like real trucking, only not really." 5/10

This game gave me a ton of respect for truckers. Before I played it, I thought they just drove from one warehouse to the other lining their pockets with cash. But once I found out that every time they bump into something, drive slightly off the road, or go ten miles over the speed limit they have cops trying to run them down to arrest them, that changed everything. I know this game is supposed to be a simulator, and I'm sure from time to time truckers do get arrested, especially coming back from Mexico, but did they really have to put that aspect into the game?

I've played a few trucking simulators before and none of them had me getting ripped out of my cab, thrown to the hood of a car, and arrested for "assaulting a police officer". Seriously, I got arrested for that. When the heck did I assault a police officer? I haven't even gotten out of my truck! And why the heck does it always look like it's raining on my windshield, even when it isn't? Ugh. Okay, fine, whatever, that doesn't sound SO bad, right? Okay, but since when do truckers have to compete with one another to get their load to the warehouse first so they can get paid? Yep, this game makes delivering cargo into a race to the finish line with three other hungry truckers. Oh, you want money for food and other living expenses? Better get here first! What the heck is this, the Hunger Games? But what else did I expect from a 1C Racing game? I should have known better.

Aside from the ridiculousness though, this game has some decent views, not such awful graphics, and once you get it configured with a controller (which is a massive pain in the butt), it isn't a complete mess. But don't get me wrong, this game should be avoided. Stay far, far away from this game. And if you actually want a good trucking simulator, pick up a copy of Euro Truck Simulator 2, that game is amazing. Unless you wanna pretend that in this game you're smuggling around a truckload of drugs to make it more believable. But who wants to use their imagination? We bought the game specifically so that we didn't have to do that!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044478530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 912, 'last_played': 1416588385}
review:
Как всегда, задумка хорошая, реализация подкачала. Тем обиднее, потому что игра находилась в разработке около 10 лет. В попытках выпустить наследника русских вторых дальнобойщиков, подконтрольная 1С студия Softlab перекраивала игру множество раз и в итоге это ни к чему хорошему не привело.
Неотзывчивое управление, кривая анимация и оптимизация.
Однако неплохой сюжет и квесты, возможность брать попутчиков, присутствие персонажей, с которыми происходит диалог в отличие от безликой в этом плане Euro truck simulator 2.
Ну и верх глупости - отсутствие русского языка в игре от русских разработчиков... Хотя мне лично это не мешает.

Вобщем с тяжелым сердцем ставлю минус и снова отправляюсь перевозить цистерны из Зальцбурга в Манхайм.

P.S. Может быть я вернусь к ней. Когда-нибудь...

author: {'steamid': '76561198110052635', 'num_games_owned': 1696, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1410802711}
review:
He puesto mucha de mi buena voluntad para poder jugar a este juego. En principio confieso que no parecía tan malo como muchos decían, pero poco a poco comprendí exactamente de que estaban hablando. Y he aquí, su merecida calificación.

En principio nos encontramos con dos modos de juego. Uno modo misión, en el que solo llevarás una carga de un punto a otro, imaginen las posibilidades dentro de este modo pudiendo hacer prácticamente NADA. Por otro lado, esta el modo historia en el que te metes dentro de un joven camionero que pretende hacerse con el “mercado” del transporte en California. En este ultimo modo, comienzas sin tener la mínima idea de lo que puedes hacer, porque a decir verdad, no existe ningún tipo de tutorial que pueda orientarte. Una vez conseguiste adivinar lo que debías de hacer, comienza un monótono ciclo de juego en el que lo único que vas a hacer es: trasportar cargas de un punto a otro y correr carreras contra otros camiones. Cada tanto surgirá alguna misión casual de llevar alguna persona a algun lado, pero es básicamente lo mismo.

Existe la posibilidad de comprar camiones (que no son demasiados) y la posibilidad de hacerle mejoras (Eso suponiendo que consigues encontrar en donde las hacen, claro) Esto es una de las mejores cosas que tiene, puesto que al menos te permite darle algunas pinceladas de color a este juego gris. Por otro lado, como todo simulador de camiones deberás de cargarle combustible a tu vehículo o quedar varado en medio de la ruta, podrás dormir en hoteles (aún sigo sin saber para que, puesto que el personaje nunca se cansa) e ir a restauran para enterarte de las últimas noticias, algo que es completamente inútil.

El sonido… bueno. Es… Es en sencillas palabras una completa cagada. En el tiempo que jugué no escuche más de dos canciones en la radio. Luego otros sonidos como disparos (si, en una misión te van a disparar y tu tendrás que huir quien sabe a donde) se parecen mucho al de las armas de juguete. El sonido de los camiones es el mismo para todos y hasta parece ser robado de otros juegos de esta temática. Las voces de los personajes, bueno no se destacan en lo absoluto y los diálogos son una basura. El aspecto grafico no parece tan malo. Eso sacando de lado que hay escenas en donde la cámara te atraviesa parcialmente o que en varias ocasiones la placa de video comienza a hervir por la mala optimización que tiene. Los paisajes son simples y aburridos. 

La parte en donde más falla este juego es justamente en la ruta. Es increíble ver que los autos se atraviesan entre si y se meten delante de ti como si nada, pero claro, cuando los chocas la policía aparece al instante cobrándote más barato que el combustible que acabas de comprar en una gasolinera. Muchos hablan de un apartado de administración (o simulación económica, según los desarrolladores), sinceramente en el tiempo que lo jugué no pude administrar absolutamente nada. Sin embargo, no voy a hacer mas menciones de ello pues puede que me llegue a equivocar. 

Finalmente, y procurando no crucificar tan asquerosamente este juego al enterarme de que vale 15 USD (a mi me lo regalaron), no puedo menos que decirle a cualquier usuario que NO COMPREN ESTE JUEGO. He jugado a otros de camiones y la verdad es que este es el peor o más patético intento de crear un simulador.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048660069', 'num_games_owned': 353, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1515850132}
review:
Даже Mafia 2 не была столь большим разочарованием, как данная, с позволения сказать, игра. Пару баллов можно накинуть за детальную симуляцию отдельных частей тягача, завораживающую ночь и одну из лучших симуляций дождя.

Общая оценка:
[h1]3/10[/h1]

Если Вам хочется покрутить баранку - обратите свой взор на [url=http://steamcommunity.com/games/227300]Euro Truck Simulator 2[/url]. Или поищите вторую часть дальнобойщиков. Даже с графикой, уровня 2002 года, она принесёт Вам гораздо больше удовольствия.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048687905', 'num_games_owned': 3865, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1434267720}
review:
I find this game really hard to recommend. I really wanted to like it, as the basis of the game is something that should be fun. After playing it for a few hours, it is the complete opposite. Graphical glitches, poor camera angles, and a few bugs that will cause the game to completely crash.

If there was a patch to fix these errors, and introduce a better camera, this game would be much more playable. But in the current state, you can safely pass this one up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028838087', 'num_games_owned': 679, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1379708045}
review: I fell in love with it's prequel - Hard Truck 2: King of the Road, with incredible soundtrack by heavy metal band Aria. So my disappointment about RnR was that much bigger. It's boring, full of bugs and glitches and many things doesn't make sense. Alright, many of that was in KotR as well, but those games are 8 years apart! So please spend your money on Euro Truck Simulator 2 instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140797364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1409993675}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035432716', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 5041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4745, 'last_played': 1619908886}
review:
Look at this as a simulator and you'll be let down. Looking at this as a truck-themed arcade game, and you'll praise:

• An amazing map - no prefabricated undersized intersections. The bespoke highways are properly scaled and a joy to drive on. You can do more than 30mph without tipping over. The map itself is huge - takes several hours to cross despite higher speeds and straighter roads than ETS

• You can see your hired drivers on the road as they work, and join them in competitive jobs

• A far, far, far more detailed truck diagnostics system than other games. Worn brake pads grind against the discs and degrade braking performance. Panels get beat up, the engine runs like crap.

• The truck upgrade system is excellent and features things like side and rear mounted cameras to cover blind spots.

• Cops (could be a con for some!)

• Nice side-missions, help out hitchhikers if you want, pick up extra jobs from cafés or over the radio

That isn't to say this game is without flaws. The iffy handling and dodgy physics are geared to racing, not driving. There are competitive jobs where you are pitted against other drivers to race cargo to its destination (very unrealistic). There are also truck races and out-of-this-world missions to complete, too.

In summary, don't look at it as a sim and you will be able to forgive its shortcomings. Go for a race or forgive the iffy handling and go for a really scenic drive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062637687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1073, 'last_played': 1453898689}

author: {'steamid': '76561198078606461', 'num_games_owned': 1573, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1405641474}
review: Remember that game on PS2 called 'Big Motha Truckers'? No? Well it's like that. This game is fun. It actually has cutscenes in which people actually talk unlike most simulators. (When was the last time you even played a "simulator" that even had detailed characters?) Something I enjoyed most about this game was the fact the cops come after you. I was arrested and even when being arrested there's a short cutscene. Yes, this review sucks. Boohoo. I don't care. This is a real world truck sim. Whereas Euro Truck Sim is a truck driving sim. Yes there's a difference. Play the game and you'll know what I mean.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012024536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1389033467}
review:
I've recomended this game. But there are some weak points players shoud know before they purchase it.
This is a game by a Russian developers. They had released a very good game about Russian truck drivers several years before.
They planned to adapt this game for players all over the world. But the development was too long and graphics wasn't very good even at release day. The potential of this game was great. But reality forced developers released the game "as is".
Besides that this game don't run well with most joystiks or controllers.
So if you want to see nice picture and use X-Box controller for playing games you should choose Euro Truck Simulator 2. But if you have a steering wheel whith pedals and you are ready for small challenges, you can try this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043728491', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 7311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3644, 'last_played': 1596139905}
review: Дальнобойщики 3 - очень недооцененная игра. На момент выхода у нее не было ни одного достойного конкурента. Ни последние 18 WoS, ни первый ETS не могли дать тех ощущений, что давала эта игра. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2006181533 Почему? А где вы в те годы видели в "траксимах" такую графику,? А такой детализированный окружающий мир? А возможность обанкротиться или разбиться насмерть? А хоть какую-то физику, в том числе(!) и модель повреждений? А возможность брать попутчиков? А классное радио с новостными и рекламными вставками? А хоть какой-нибудь сюжет? https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2006209537 Серьезно, все её минусы и баги можно (и нужно!) простить за это. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197991984117', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1403260287}
review:
The game has a great premise: A trucking simulator with a Rock 'n Roll edge to it. Unlike Euro Truck Simulator, there is visible, physics based damage. Driving into traffic will result in the cops being called, guns drawn. The game's story mode however is archaic. The spoken dialogue slightly differs from what appears in the forced-on closed captions. 

There's blatant sexual tokenization of women as well from the outset with your "footloose and fancy-free" secretary - your character even asks "is she married?" 

From playing it on Windows 8.1, the mouse cursor doesn't move with where your mouse is on screen, which led to half an hour trying to visualize where to hover my mouse to program my non-existent game controller settings. 

The game needs an update to fix this rather dire issue.

This game probably actually has a lot to offer, but it's not aged gracefully in both on a cultural, and technical level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073407506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1415558454}
review:
This game, not only impressed me, but impressed my friends and family. The immerse gameplay and fantastic graphics were fantastic. The engine was absolutely superb. I came across no glitches AT ALL while playing this game and it led to a truly fabulous experience. After starting the adequate storyline video in the beginning, it felt like I was an actual Truck driver. I was delivering cargo throughout various places dotted on the detailed and great visuals. I had no issues completing very realistic tasks, such as delivering flowers to random buildings and then leaving the back-end of my truck right outside. I personally had a very super time. 
69/10.
Would buy again for 4x the money based on the quality I earned from it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982453067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1393819824}
review:
Really a horrible attempt to a homage to the Hard Truck series, I was happy I finally discovered something similar to the idea of King of The Road, but this game has horrible physics, the cameras are a disaster, not a simulation at all, the menus are confusing, the trucks are boring, and you start with a ton of money right away. It's no fun, I'd rather just go back to Euro Truck Sim 2. 

Will some company please just copy everything from King of The Road, update the simulation physics, and just keep all the features and realistic truck models that made that game more fun, all it really needs are updated graphics... I guess those days of gaming are over.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107335974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1596054227}
review:
Долгострой поколения.


Название "Дальнобойщики" ассоциируется у русского человека не только с телесериалом о приключениях Федора Иваныча и его колоритного напарника Сашка, но и с серией игр - симуляторов грузоперевозок, разработанных новосибирской студией Soft Lab NSK. Россияне были первыми, кто перенес суровую мужскую работу на экраны компьютеров. После успешной первой игры - "Дальнобойщики - Путь к Победе" вышедшей в 1998 году, в 2001 выходит вторая часть, которая становится поистене культовой, а саундтрек, написанный группой "Ария", и поныне лежит в плеере вашего покорнного слуги. Но сегодня мы поговорим о третьей части, которую ждали без малого 7 лет и надо сказать, реакция игроков на проект, была очень неоднозначной. Почему? Постараюсь обьяснить.

Тормозная жидкость.

Мысль о том, что разработчики смачно полили свои компьютеры этим веществом, перед тем как начать делать игру, возникает на первом сюжетном ролике. До выхода официальных патчей, сцена, в которой Мэтью разьясняет главному герою Николаю Перепелову правила игры шла с неприлично малым количеством кадров в секунду. После нее, тоже все было безрадостно, пока     патчи не вышли. Стабильные 30 fps с трафиком были достижением. Трафик тут упомянут неспроста. Довольно быстро удалось выяснить, что легковушки на дорогах, есть главный пожиратель ресурсов в игре, и если трафик отключить, то игра начинала шустро бежать даже на слабом ПК. Однако тот факт, что вышли патчи, не означает того, что проблема оптимизации решена полностью. Для максимальных настроек нужен довольно мощный компьютер и это при том, что графика в игре далеко не самая продвинутая.

Сюжет.

Тут новосибирцы, в очередной раз удивили, внедрив в грузовой жанр сюжетную линию. Завязка проста. Русский дальнобойщик - Николай Перепелов, приезжает в солнечную Калифорнию, чтобы поднять с нуля транспортную компанию, на этом пути он встретит друзей и врагов, и в конце концов станет королем грузоперевозок штата. Кроме основного сюжета в игре присутствуют более ста заданий, от автостопщиков, до перевозки особых грузов. Однако и тут не обошлось без проколов. Некоторые задания нелогичны, имеют баги(может к примеру не появится груз в назначенном месте)

Стальные монстры.

Сердце любого автосимулятора - машины, в данном случае грузовики. На первый взгляд к ним никаких воппросов и проработаны отлично как снаружи так и внутри, и кастомизация отличная, можно к примеру собственный окрас кабины загрузить, выбор тагачей тоже неплох.... Но стоит сесть за руль, как начинаешь задавать вопросы, почему разница в массе прицепа такая мизерная и его наличие за спиной не чувствуется почти никак? Почему столкновения с трафиком так неубедительны? Модель повреждений зачастую работает неадекватно. Пример: вы цепляйте бордюр на маленькой скорости, но урон такой, будто вы влетели в столб на полном ходу.
Также, как и в двух предыдущих частях, вы доставляйте грузы и одновременно соревнуйтесь с конкурентами. Тут тоже на первый взгляд все отлично, риск, азарт, но опять натыкаемся на обидные недочеты. Первый и самый главный, неадекватный ИИ водителей легковушек, резкие перестроения, пробки на ровном месте, иногда водителю взбредет перестроится прямо перед вами, и это гарантированное ДТП.
Вторая ложка дегтя - стражи порядка. Полиция здесь владеет исскуством телепортции. Вы чуть - чуть зацепили  медленно плетущийся пикап и вот уже где-то воет сирена, хотя полиции на горизонте не было. Удрать можно, но лучше остановится и заплатить штраф.

Контраст.

Именно так можно охарактеризовать  графику игры. Детально проработанные тягачи, освещение, красивый дождь, соседствуют с картонным окружением и уродливыми моделями персонажей.


Вердикт:

У игры немало сильных сторон, но все испорчено багами и недодуманностью некоторых элементов, той же полиции. 

+
Большой игровой мир, образцом для которого послужила реальная Калифорния.
Широкий выбор тягачей.
Сюжет
Реалистичный дождь.  
Много второстепенных заданий.

-
Неадекватный трафик и полиция.
Высокие требования к железу, при не самой продвинутой графике
Недоделанная физика.
Некорректно работает система повреждений.
Оценка 7,0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198089437317', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1652939013}
review:
Из плюсов: неплохая для 2010 года графика, отличная модель повреждений.
Минусы: однообразие игрового мира (минус сомнительный, т.к. много тут идей не наберешься), отсутствие полноценной поддержки игрового руля с 900 градусами (например Logitech G25/G27), трудно назвать симулятором (физика аркадная на все 100%).
Еще меня очень удивило отсутствие русского языка, хоть и данная игра от российских разработчиков.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971874495', 'num_games_owned': 741, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1345186800}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999571556', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1421448275}
review: Купил я это чудо за 0.5$, установил, запустил и сражу же удивило отсутствие русского языка. Логично, по мне так. Какой русский в игре от русских разработчиков? Ладно, пошел скачивать русификатор. Русификатор ещё прибавляет к вашим несчастьям, давно умерший StarForce, который пришлось обходить keygen'ом (извините, но полбакса за эту ахинею уже обдираловка). Запускаю, начинаю новую игру, вижу потрясающую графику, великолепную анимацию лиц, да такую, что сам L.A. Noire и Beyond Two Souls нервно курят в сторонке. И всё... на половине катсцены игра вылетела и стала вылетать при зарузки. Может это русификатор виноват, может просто как всегда разработчики забыли достать руки из жопы. Не важно. Хотите покататься на тягоче - вперёд за Euro Truck Simulator 2. У меня всё.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000464840', 'num_games_owned': 852, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 0, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 0}
review: This is a CSI: MIami spinoff where some guy asks you to borrow your wrench. It's a real tear-jerker of a story. You can also drive carrots around the highways of California if you're into that sort of thing, but I don't see why you would be.

review: Nice features for a truck simulator, such crashable trucks, and graphics. But the camera and controls really sucks. The physics are also lame. This really killed the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014784204', 'num_games_owned': 2276, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1361260800}
review: Не стоит играть , а тем более покупать эту игру. Я не верю, что ее делали те же люди, которые сделали Дальнобойщики 2. Игра ужасна во всем начиная с графики и заканчивая управлением. Одна из худших игр в которые я играл.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963885058', 'num_games_owned': 480, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 86400}
review: Once in a while, trucking sims are just great fun.  I found this one to be decent, even though I never got far, and the fact it has a storyline adds to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063367595', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 2717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2717, 'last_played': 1380591413}

Tirando que é meio pesado e tem alguns erros, é um jogo bem legal (para quem gosta do gênero).

PS: Nada de comparar com Euro Truck Simulator 2, são de epocas diferentes.

悪者もトラックで襲ってくる

author: {'steamid': '76561198030433867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 87224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86486, 'last_played': 1631501041}
review:
This is one of the best American trucking sims I have seen in a long time...
However, ETS2 is nipping at their heels and will probably surpass them very soon because of their constant updates in maps, trucks and gameplay. The one thing that R&R has over ETS2 is the awesome animation and voice over of the characters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028171222', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1468378106}
review:
This game makes me want to buy Euro Truck than this piece of S***.

Pros-
Kind of cool rain droplets on the windsheld

Con-
-Bad controls
-weak story
-Uninteresting Characters
-Bad game design
-So many bugs and issues
-almost incompatible joystick ports

Overall, this was a total waste of money to buy for. This Disapoints me that this is the same company(s) who made the original Hard Truck and Its better version Hard Truck 2/ King of the Road.

Save your 10 - 20 dollars and buy a decent truck simulator on steam or find the original truck games from 1C.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011997481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 86400}
review: A head-on collision with a school bus left me wanting more. No damage models, and no screaming children? What the hell did I wasted 58 minutes of my life for???

author: {'steamid': '76561197996888000', 'num_games_owned': 2535, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1313391600}
review:
I found it extremely frustrating to play, with a cluttered and confused UI.  This was supposed to be called "Hard Truck 3" but they changed the name prior to release.  In some ways it is better than Hard Truck 1 & 2, and in other ways it feels like a cheap knockoff of those games.  If you've played other games from this Russian publisher, well, in my opinion they all kind of suck in one way or another and this is no exception.

If this game had been released in 1999, it would have been OK as a budget title.

review: It's a very very good truck driving sim. Is it realistic it tries to be. but its very easy on the traffic and the controls are bit ponderous. Grfx are ok. Fun to play. BUy it if you always wanted to know what it was like to control one of these beasts.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999525167', 'num_games_owned': 905, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 86400}

author: {'steamid': '76561197975487539', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1324972800}
review: Hard Truck's spiritual succesor. You begin you're journey as Nick Armstrong a trucker to the core who as come to California to strike out a new living. You begin as a humble truck driver who over time becomes a trucking mogul ruling his own dynasty (Nick Trucking). Experience the amazing storyline, full of drama, fast pace races and even death. Weather you're a Hard Trucker or just a casual looking to enter the exciting world of trucking, this game is for you.
